hero.title: Strategic Plans
hero.intro: A multi-year roadmap aligning academics, research, community, and infrastructure to nurture future-ready technologists and entrepreneurs.

objectives.title: Shivalik College of Engineering
objectives.description: Institutional priorities that guide academic rigor, capability building, accreditation, and research momentum across engineering disciplines.
objectives: Be recognized for quality engineering education with cross-disciplinary integration through an effective teaching and learning process.
Elevate student and faculty development by offering a world-class, campus-based educational experience.
Benchmark and standardize processes and policies to secure accreditations from statutory bodies.
Provide institutional research funding that helps faculty initiate quality research and craft competitive proposals for external grants.

objectives.title: College of Pharmacy
objectives.description: Objectives tailored to pharmacy education excellence, regulatory readiness, and impactful pharmaceutical research.
objectives: Be recognized for quality pharmacy education with deep integration across pharmaceutical sciences via effective teaching and learning.
Advance student and faculty development through a pharmacy-focused, world-class campus experience.
Standardize processes and policies to obtain accreditation from pharmacy statutory bodies.
Offer institutional research funding that enables faculty to launch quality pharmaceutical research and prepare strong proposals for external support.

metadata.title: Strategic Plans | Shivalik College
metadata.description: Explore the Blueprint 2030 initiatives powering curriculum innovation, research, student experience, and infrastructure at Shivalik College.
